long_description: Praising the Nite Ize S-Biner, Backpacker April '08 declares, ''Don't ask yourself if you need this useful little widget. The question is: How many?'' It's offered here in size 2. This unique double-clip carabiner from Nite Ize offers a great way to manage your keys or other items. Dual hook design with opposing gates allow you to easily link two things together. Rugged stainless steel and secure gate closure. Rated to hold up to 10 lbs.
short_description: Praising the Nite Ize S-Biner, Backpacker April '08 declares, ''Don't ask yourself if you need this useful little widget. The question is: How many?'' It's offered here in size 2.
